poem.title: The West
poem.author: Peter McCarey /Charley Marley
poem.text: Soft power'd wax or wane with the Shellac, vinyl. TV. Drip fed, Deep fried. String vest, Wild West and every wean A cowboy then Geronimo. You rode the South Side wagon train Or chained your bike to the paling. John Wayne never had that problem with his horse.
